books.author: by John Sandford
books.description: The 28th book in the Prey series. A federal marshal looks into the actions of a member of the Senate Intelligence Committee.
books.name: TWISTED PREY

books.author: by David Baldacci
books.description: Amos Decker, known as the Memory Man, puts his talents toward solving a string of murders in a Rust Belt town.
books.name: THE FALLEN

books.author: by Lee Child
books.description: Jack Reacher tracks down the owner of a pawned West Point class ring and stumbles upon a large criminal enterprise.
books.name: THE MIDNIGHT LINE

books.author: by Lisa Jackson and Nancy Bush
books.description: A couple reunites uneasily five years after a gunman opened fire on their wedding party.
books.name: ONE LAST BREATH

books.author: by Iris Johansen
books.description: A forensic sculptor receives a mysterious package containing a skull she reconstructs to discover its identity.
books.name: SHATTERED MIRROR

books.author: by Ernest Cline
books.description: It’s 2044, life on a resource-depleted Earth is grim, and the key to a vast fortune is hidden in a virtual-reality world.
books.name: READY PLAYER ONE

books.author: by Celeste Ng
books.description: An artist upends a quiet town outside Cleveland.
books.name: LITTLE FIRES EVERYWHERE

books.author: by John Grisham
books.description: A search for stolen rare manuscripts leads to a Florida island.
books.name: CAMINO ISLAND

books.author: by Kristin Hannah
books.description: A former prisoner of war returns from Vietnam and moves his family to Alaska, where they face tough conditions.
books.name: THE GREAT ALONE

books.author: by Meghan March
books.description: The second book of the Savage Trilogy.
books.name: IRON PRINCESS

books.author: by Lisa Scottoline
books.description: A woman marries a widower and reunites with her teenage daughter who is murdered soon after, and the husband is put on trial for it.
books.name: AFTER ANNA

books.author: by Lisa Wingate
books.description: A South Carolina lawyer learns about the questionable practices of a Tennessee orphanage.
books.name: BEFORE WE WERE YOURS

books.author: by Mary Higgins Clark
books.description: A high school guidance counselor tries to uncover the identity of her sister’s murderer.
books.name: I'VE GOT MY EYES ON YOU

books.author: by Bella Andre and Jennifer Skully
books.description: The fifth book in the Maverick Billionaires series.
books.name: WILD IN LOVE

books.author: by Kevin Kwan
books.description: A New Yorker gets a surprise when she spends the summer with her boyfriend in Singapore.
books.name: CRAZY RICH ASIANS
